channel.description: Recent content in Post on theGreatWhiteShark

item.title: Moving from Wordpress to Github Pages+Hugo
item.description: I moved my blog from Wordpress to Github Pages. In addition, I also decided to split the blog in three different parts. Art, coding, and music are just a little too diverse and I intend to do further posts in all of these subjects. You can find the blogs via the following links music blog coding blog overall blog Motivation First of all, I have to say: I had a nice time on Wordpress and it was a great place to start my blog.
